item.title: Books of 2018
item.description: Books of 2018 Recently I find myself reading a lot more technical books, actually in 2018 I read only technical books due to a lot of context switching between different projects. Books helped me to quickly accommodate in new technical stack. I believe they are amazing source of knowledge. Here I want to recommend some of the books I read with brief description: Compilers: Principles, Techniques, and Tools (2nd Edition) link
